TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentPresenter extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

span.span: Displays the content of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會使用中的來指定要加入的內容的位置。You typically use the in the of a to specify where the content is to be added. 每個類型具有在其預設。Every type has a in its default . 當物件是處於的、 ， ，和屬性取得其值之屬性的相同名稱的。When a object is in a of a , the , , and properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the . 您可以擁有屬性從樣板化的父代的其他屬性取得這些屬性的值，藉由設定屬性或繫結到它們。You can have the property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the property or binding to them. 使用下列邏輯來顯示:The uses the following logic to display the : - 如果屬性設定，套用，至屬性與產生的並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。If the property on the is set, the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. 如需有關物件，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). - 如果屬性設定，適用於適當至屬性與產生的並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。If the property on the is set, the applies the appropriate to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果沒有相關聯的型別、套用，至屬性與產生的並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。If there is a associated with the type of , the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果是物件隨即出現。If is a object, the is displayed. 如果已經有父代，發生例外狀況。If the already has a parent, an exception occurs. - 如果沒有將轉換的型別至、會使用該與產生的隨即出現。If there is a that converts the type of to a , the uses that and the resulting is displayed. - 如果沒有將轉換的型別為字串，會使用該並建立包含該字串。If there is a that converts the type of to a string, the uses that and creates a to contain that string. 隨即顯示。The is displayed. - 如果內容，值屬性顯示在。If the content is an , the value of the property is displayed in a . - 呼叫方法並建立包含所傳回的字串。The calls the method on the and creates a to contain the string returned by . 隨即顯示。The is displayed. ## Examples 下列示範設定的。The following shows a that sets the of a . 定義會顯示為內項目。The defines that the appears as an within a element. 標示，的應該顯示及置中以垂直和水平內。The marks that the of the should be displayed and centered vertically and horizontally within the . [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)] 下圖顯示的外觀這取得套用時：The following image shows the appearance of the when this gets applied: ![Button ControlTemplate 範例](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate 範例")![Button ControlTemplate sample](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate sample")

The to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別會實作以下規則：The base class implements the following rules: 1. 如果設定中使用它。If is set, use it. 2. 如果設定時，呼叫其方法。If is set, call its method. 如果結果不是`null`，使用它。If the result is not `null`, use it. 3. 尋找其符合已知的資源之間的內容（包括應用程式、 主題和系統資源）。Look for a whose matches the content among the resources known to the (including application, theme, and system resources). 如果找到一個物件，使用它。If one is found, use it. 4. 如果類型是 「 通用 」，使用標準範本。If the type of is "common", use a standard template. 常見的類型為`String`， ，和。The common types are `String`, , and . 5. 否則，請使用基本上會將轉換的預設範本為字串，並顯示在。Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts to a string and displays it in a . 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這些規則，並實作其本身。Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將中的，它會自動顯示的樣板化控制項。When you place a in the of a , it automatically displays the of the templated control. 這表示，如果您設定的您是、屬性隱含地繫結至的的使用中且。This means that if you set the of your to be , the property of the is implicitly bound to the of the that is using that . 若要設定的繫結屬性，您可能要考慮使用屬性。To set up bindings for the properties, you may want to consider using the property. 屬性會指向樣板化的父代，以及別名的屬性相關聯的範本和範本選擇器內容自動。The property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 通常，您會使用`TemplateBinding`繫結此屬性值為樣板化控制項上的值。Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control. 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能為這個屬性時使用範本中。This property should only be used when the is in a template. 當範本包含與設為"`Abc`"，則， ，和屬性的別名是自動`Abc`， `AbcTemplate`，和`AbcTemplateSelector`分別。When a template contains a with set to "`Abc`", the , , and properties of the are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively. 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]，設定至 「`Abc`」 也會導致屬性的別名`AbcStringFormat`。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting to "`Abc`" also causes the property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`. 最有用的兩個值，這個屬性為 「 內容 」 和 「 標頭 」。The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header". ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範的樣式，示範如何使用屬性：The following example shows a style for a that demonstrates the usage of the property: [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或屬性、屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|
